API Endpoints.POST /api/users: Add a new user. Requires the following keys: username, password. Username must be unique and should be lowercase
API Endpoints.GET /api/users/:username?password=:passw: Returns 200 for a valid password, 400 for an incorrect one
API Endpoints.GET /api/users/:username/journeys: Get all journeys for a user
API Endpoints.POST /api/journeys: Add a new journey. Takes the following keys: user, image (url string - optional), previous versions (array of mongoIDs, optional), route (array of objects with the following keys: latLang (object with latitude and longitude keys), timestamp (optional), strokeWidth (integer, optional), strokeColor (hex code, optional), newSection (boolean)
